optionsTitle.description: The title for the options pane.

optionsArchiveDescription.message:
In many cases, web pages do not provide information about the web archive that should be used to gain access to their history. The Memento extension allows selecting a default web archive to use in those cases:

* Memento Aggregator: When selecting this option, page history available in several web archives is taken into account. This option improves the chances to retrieve an archived page that is close to the selected time travel date. It is the recommended option.
* Specific Archive: When selecting this option, only page history available in the chosen archive is taken into account.
* Unlisted Archive: This option is provided for those familiar with the Memento protocol. Enter the baseURI of TimeGates of a web archive that is not listed below in the text box, making sure that baseURI ends with a "/". Be aware that the TimeGates available at that baseURI must be compliant with the Memento protocol. To revert back to any of the listed archives clear the text box.
optionsArchiveDescription.description: This is the text that explains the individual archive choices

optionsCurrentlyUsedArchiveTitle.description: Title that mentions the currently chosen web archive

optionsCurrentlyUsedArchiveUrl.description: The text that displays the archive name and it's base uri

optionsSelectArchiveTitle.message: Select the web archive you would like to use:
optionsSelectArchiveTitle.description: Title that mentions the text to choose a web archive

optionsUpdateButtonText.description: The text for the update archive selection button

optionsUnlistedArchiveUrlError.message: The entered TimeGate baseURL is not valid.
